library(plotly)
library(reshape2)

project.id <- 'tools.cdt'
file.evol = paste("", project.id, "_its_evol.csv", sep="")
evol <- read.csv(file=file.evol, header=T)

my.data.long <- melt(evol[,c(1:8)], id.vars="date", value.name="value", variable.name="metric")
p <-plot_ly(my.data.long, x = date, y = metric, size = value, mode = "markers", width = 800, height = 200)
p
